title: Requirement Document
content:
# 1. Document Control & Versioning
**Author**: Idea-to-Deploy Platform
**Date**: 2025-12-24
**Version**: 1.0.0 (Baseline)

# 2. Project Background & Objectives
This project, **Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

**, is designed to deliver a high-quality solution in the **E-commerce** domain. The primary objective is to streamline operations and provide value through specialized features.

# 3. Stakeholder Identification
- **Project Sponsor**: Idea-to-Deploy Platform
- **Technical Lead**: AI Architect
- **End Users**: Users interacting with E-commerce services.

# 4. Assumptions & Constraints
- **Assumption**: Scalable cloud infrastructure is available for deployment.
- **Constraint**: Delivery within a 12-week timeframe as per standard PMP guidelines.

# 5. In-Scope / Out-of-Scope
- **In-Scope**: Implementation of User Registration, Login, Logout and core E-commerce logic.
- **Out-of-Scope**: Physical hardware procurement and third-party legacy data cleaning.

# 6. Functional Requirements
## REQ-001: User Registration
The system shall provide robust User Registration capabilities to support the core functionality of Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

.

## REQ-002: Login
The system shall provide robust Login capabilities to support the core functionality of Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

.

## REQ-003: Logout
The system shall provide robust Logout capabilities to support the core functionality of Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

.

## REQ-004: Forgot Password
The system shall provide robust Forgot Password capabilities to support the core functionality of Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

.

## REQ-005: Profile Management
The system shall provide robust Profile Management capabilities to support the core functionality of Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

.

## REQ-006: Product Listing
The system shall provide robust Product Listing capabilities to support the core functionality of Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

.

## REQ-007: Shopping Cart
The system shall provide robust Shopping Cart capabilities to support the core functionality of Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

.

## REQ-008: Checkout
The system shall provide robust Checkout capabilities to support the core functionality of Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

.

## REQ-009: Order Management
The system shall provide robust Order Management capabilities to support the core functionality of Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

.

## REQ-0010: Payment Integration
The system shall provide robust Payment Integration capabilities to support the core functionality of Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

.

## REQ-0011: Admin Dashboard
The system shall provide robust Admin Dashboard capabilities to support the core functionality of Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

.

## REQ-0012: User Management
The system shall provide robust User Management capabilities to support the core functionality of Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

.

# 7. Non-Functional Requirements
- **NFR-001 (Performance)**: The Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

 system must load within 2 seconds.
- **NFR-002 (Security)**: All data for E-commerce must be encrypted at rest and in transit.

# 8. User Roles & Permissions
- **Admin**: Full access to manage the Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

 platform.
- **Standard User**: Access to core E-commerce features.

# 9. Business Rules
Data integrity must be maintained across all **E-commerce** transactions.

# 10. Use Cases / User Stories
- **US-001**: As a user, I want to use User Registration so that I can achieve my task in Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

.

# 11. UI/UX & Screen References
The interface will follow modern design principles tailored for the **E-commerce** industry.

# 12. Data Requirements
Relational database storage optimized for **E-commerce** data entities.

# 13. Regulatory & Compliance Requirements
Compliance with industry standards relevant to **E-commerce** and GDPR.

# 14. Requirement Traceability Matrix (RTM)
Linking all functional requirements (REQ-001 to REQ-0012) to business objectives.

title: Project Planning Document
content:
# 1. Project Overview
Project **Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

** is a Complex complexity project in the **E-commerce** sector.

# 2. Project Governance Structure
Strict PMP-based governance with a Project Manager overseeing the implementation of Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

.

# 3. Project Organization & Roles
- **Project Manager**: Managing the 12-week schedule.
- **Developers**: Implementing User Registration, Login, Logout, Forgot Password, Profile Management, Product Listing, Shopping Cart, Checkout, Order Management, Payment Integration, Admin Dashboard, User Management.

# 4. Project Methodology (Agile)
Agile Scrum methodology with 2-week sprints to iterate on **Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

** features.

# 5. Work Breakdown Structure (WBS)
- **Phase 1**: Initial Analysis & E-commerce Domain Research
- **Phase 2**: Development of User Registration, Login, Logout, Forgot Password, Profile Management, Product Listing
- **Phase 3**: Integration of remaining features
- **Phase 4**: Final Testing & Deployment of Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.



# 6. Deliverables & Milestones
- **MS-1**: Requirement Sign-off (Week 2)
- **MS-2**: E-commerce MVP Completion (Week 8)
- **MS-3**: Final Handover of **Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

** (Week 12)

# 7. Resource Planning
Engineers specializing in **E-commerce** technology stack and cloud architects.

# 8. Communication Management Plan
Bi-weekly status meetings regarding **Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

** progress.

# 9. Change Management Plan
Standard change request process for any scope adjustments in the **Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

** roadmap.

# 10. Dependency Management
Depends on the completion of the core **E-commerce** engine.

# 11. Assumptions & Constraints
Assumes availability of E-commerce domain experts for validation.

title: Technical Architecture & Delivery Plan
content:
# 1. Architecture Overview
Technical architecture design for **Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

**, optimized for the **E-commerce** domain.

# 2. System Context Diagram
Shows how Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

 interacts with users and external E-commerce APIs.

# 3. Logical Architecture
Breakdown of the system into frontend, backend, and E-commerce-specific services.

# 4. Physical Architecture
Hosted on scalable cloud infrastructure to support the Complex nature of **Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

**.

# 5. Technology Stack
Utilizing: Next.js, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Stripe Integration.

# 6. Application Architecture
Modular design pattern to separate User Registration, Login, Logout from core platform logic.

# 7. Database & Data Flow Design
Schema design for **Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

** entities including users and E-commerce specific data.

# 8. API & Integration Strategy
Secure RESTful endpoints for Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

 communication.

# 9. Security Architecture
JWT-based authentication and role-based access for Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

 users.

# 10. Scalability & Performance Design
Load balancing to handle E-commerce traffic spikes.

# 11. Deployment Architecture
Automated CI/CD pipeline for rapid Build a full-stack e-commerce platform that allows users to register, browse products, manage a shopping cart, place orders, make payments, track order status, and manage returns, with an admin dashboard for product, inventory, and order management.

 iterations.

# 12. Technical Risks & Mitigations
Risk: Integration delay with E-commerce third-party tools.
Mitigation: Early prototyping of external interfaces.

 with 12 core features.
